languages.text: {n}Абеляр сдержанно кивает и обводит взглядом остолбеневших офицеров.{/n} "Будем надеяться, присутствующие уяснили урок от {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Оффицио Префектус{/d}".

{n}Abelard gives a reserved nod and glares at the speechless officers.{/n} "I certainly hope that all of us here have taken this lesson from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Officio Prefectus{/d} to heart."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр сдержанно кивает и обводит взглядом остолбеневших офицеров.{/n} "Будем надеяться, присутствующие уяснили урок от {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Оффицио Префектус{/d}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard gives a reserved nod and glares at the speechless officers.{/n} "I certainly hope that all of us here have taken this lesson from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Officio Prefectus{/d} to heart."

{n}Abelard gives a reserved nod and glares at the speechless officers.{/n} "I certainly hope that all of us here have taken this lesson from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Officio Prefectus{/d} to heart."

{n}Abelard gives a reserved nod and glares at the speechless officers.{/n} "I certainly hope that all of us here have taken this lesson from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Officio Prefectus{/d} to heart."

languages.text: {n}Abelard nickt zurückhaltend und sieht die sprachlosen Offiziere an.{/n} "Ich hoffe wirklich, dass alle von uns sich diese Lektion des {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Officio Prefectus{/d} zu Herzen nehmen."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives a reserved nod and glares at the speechless officers.{/n} "I certainly hope that all of us here have taken this lesson from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Officio Prefectus{/d} to heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard nickt zurückhaltend und sieht die sprachlosen Offiziere an.{/n} "Ich hoffe wirklich, dass alle von uns sich diese Lektion zu Herzen nehmen."

languages.text: {n}Abélard hoche légèrement la tête puis lance un regard noir aux officiers abasourdis.{/n} « J'espère en effet que nous retiendrons tous cette leçon de l'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Officio Prefectus{/d}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives a reserved nod and glares at the speechless officers.{/n} "I certainly hope that all of us here have taken this lesson from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Officio Prefectus{/d} to heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard hoche légèrement la tête puis lance un regard noir aux officiers abasourdis.{/n} « J'espère en effet que nous retiendrons tous cette leçon de l'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Officio Prefectus{/d}. »

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德矜持地点了点头，瞪着噤若寒蝉的众多军官。{/n}“我确实希望在场的各位都能牢牢记住这个来自{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}政务部{/d}的教训。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives a reserved nod and glares at the speechless officers.{/n} "I certainly hope that all of us here have taken this lesson from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Officio Prefectus{/d} to heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德矜持地点了点头，瞪着噤若寒蝉的众多军官。{/n}“我确实希望在场的各位都能牢牢记住这个教训。”

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは控えめに頷き、黙りこくった士官たちを睨みつけた。{/n}「ここにいる我ら全員が、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}帝国管理局{/d}の教訓を心に刻んだことを願う」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives a reserved nod and glares at the speechless officers.{/n} "I certainly hope that all of us here have taken this lesson from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Officio Prefectus{/d} to heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは控えめに頷き、黙りこくった士官たちを睨みつけた。{/n}「ここにいる我ら全員が、この教訓を心に刻んだことを願う」

languages.text: {n}Abelard asiente con reservas y fulmina con la mirada a los oficiales estupefactos.{/n} «Espero de verdad que todos nos apliquemos esta lección del {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Officio Prefectus{/d}».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives a reserved nod and glares at the speechless officers.{/n} "I certainly hope that all of us here have taken this lesson from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Officio Prefectus{/d} to heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard asiente con reservas y fulmina con la mirada a los estupefactos oficiales.{/n} «Espero de verdad que todos nos apliquemos esta lección».

languages.text: {n}Abelard, vakur bir şekilde başını sallıyor ve gözlerini nutku tutulmuş subaylara dikiyor.{/n} "Umarım buradaki herkes, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Officio Prefektus{/d}'un bu dersini iyice anlamıştır."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives a reserved nod and glares at the speechless officers.{/n} "I certainly hope that all of us here have taken this lesson from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Officio Prefectus{/d} to heart."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, vakur bir şekilde başını sallıyor ve gözlerini nutku tutulmuş subaylara dikiyor.{/n} "Umarım buradaki herkes, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Officio Prefectus{/d}'un bu dersini iyice anlamıştır."
